name: Electric Drill
Description: An electric drill is a drill which is driven by an electric motor. The invention of the electric drill is credited to Arthur James

name: Power Saw
Description: A power saw is a portable mechanical machine used for both industrial and DIY projects.

name: Safety Helmet
Description: Safety helmets can prevent or minimise injuries to the head and brain, protecting against falling objects or debris

name: Duct Tape
Description: tap, a screwlike tool that has threads like a bolt and two, three, or four longitudinal flutes or grooves and that is used to cut screw threads in a nut or a hole.

name: Hammer
Description: A hammer is a tool, most often a hand tool, consisting of a weighted  fixed to a long handle that is swung to deliver an impact to a small area of an object.

name: Grinder
